info.task: navigate backwards to collapsed select-only combobox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed select-only combobox

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the Combobox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
